data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Alirajpur, Madhya Pradesh, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Alirajpur, Madhya Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Alirajpur
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Alirajpur, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, please raise up prophets in Alirajpur who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Alirajpur.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Brahmin Trivedi Mewada people.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Alirajpur hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Alirajpur.
Spirit, help the fearful in Alirajpur, Madhya Pradesh, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

location.name: Alirajpur
